name: Dauntless
overview:
Dauntless is an entertainment, sports, media & business advisory located in Los Angeles, California.

Dauntless serves the business, marketing, and branding needs of clients, whether corporate or individual, with respect to their businesses and business and financial interests.

Dauntless also creates companies, independently or with clients, and leverages its relationships to accelerate the growth of the same. Examples include:

 A. The Tony Romo Matchplay Tournament to be held in July 2011, where the greatest non-PGA athletes in golf will compete in a match-play format;

 B. A major motion picture project where Dauntless achieved success after forming a production company with its well-known client.

Dauntless members Lee Weinberg and Tye Gonser are Managers of the Dauntless Founders Fund, L.P., an early-stage fund dedicated to achieving accelerated results for invested portfolio companies and its funding LPs, many of whom are sports and celebrity clients and associates.
